name: Cannabis Hyperemesis Syndrome
chief_complaint: I've been vomiting non-stop for days, and hot showers are the only thing that helps.
prognosis: Good with cessation of cannabis use; symptoms typically resolve within days to weeks.
description: A condition characterized by recurrent episodes of severe nausea, vomiting, and abdominal pain in chronic cannabis users. Paradoxically, patients often report temporary relief with hot showers or baths.
